title: Imran Khan, Ex-Prime Minister of Pakistan, Is Shot at Rally
description: Mr. Khan, who was leading a protest march, was wounded in both legs, in an attack that threated to plunge the country into turmoil.
dc:creator: Salman Masood and Christina Goldbaum
